name: Foxy Tales (itch)
description:
Foreword

This game was created for the "Community Game Jam" from 24th to 31st of August 2019. The theme for this game jam was: "The game is a liar." Due time we could not add all ideas to the project. All missing parts are listed down below.

You can also find our other projects here.

Credits

Art Design by Cloud-Jumper05

Sound Effects by ELL-H

Programming by Clever AI

Description

Foxy Tales is a 2D adventure game in which you have to make decisions in life. The protagonist Fulvia is searching for an escape of this mystic world and encounters serious decisions which can lead to unpredictable consequences.

Controls
  • A/D or left/right arrow key to run
  • W or space key to jump
  • S key to fall faster
  • Ctrl, Enter/Return or LMB to proceed dialogue
  • ESC to go back to main menu (current progress gets lost)
Missing parts
  • more interactivities like hiding, using levers, etc.
  • more different obstacles
  • small enemies
  • endboss
